title: Must books that contain 30 Juz of Quran separately be respected & treated like Quran? Assimalhakeem
transcript: Abdul Hameed says there are 30 different books that contains 30 Jews of the Koran so there's Jews I'm juju Tabarrok etc these books do not contain anything except the verses of the Koran must must we treat and respect these books as Quran of course you have to it's not a choice you must respect these chapters because this is part of the Quran the second question is do we have to be in woudl the answer is most likely yes just to be safe rather than sorry though they it is not the full Quran but it still is considered part of it
